original_text: Then you should have put my money into the bank. When I came home, I would have received my money back, with extra money.”
korean_text: 그러면 어찌하여 내 돈을 은행에 맡기지 아니하였느냐 그리하였으면 내가 와서 그 이자와 함께 그 돈을 찾았으리라 하고

sentences.original_text: Then you should have put my money into the bank.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신은 내 돈을 은행에 넣었어야 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: I would have received my money back,
